backend/main.mo: Main Motoko actor defining the hospital management system with types for doctors, emergency cases, and medical suggestions, plus CRUD operations for doctor registration/login, case management, user profiles, and admin authorization via AccessControl mixin.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping two implemented features—AdminDashboard stat cards and useQueries.ts stat hooks—to their respective files, components, and test IDs with high confidence.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: JSON document containing one-to-two sentence summaries of all frontend source files, serving as a reference index for the project's React components, hooks, and styles.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind CSS entry file defining OKLCH-based CSS custom properties for light and dark color themes including background, foreground, chart, and sidebar variables.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point for the Vitals AI app, setting metadata, theme color, PWA manifest link, and mounting the React app via main.tsx.
frontend/public/manifest.json: PWA manifest for Vitals AI defining app name, description, display mode, theme colors, and a 128x128 icon.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root React component that sets up TanStack Router with six routes (/, /select-role, /portal-selection, /patient, /doctor, /admin), wraps the app in QueryClientProvider and ThemeProvider, and renders a shared Layout with Header, Footer, and SupportButton.
frontend/src/components/AccessDeniedScre: Component that renders an access denied screen shown to unauthorized users attempting to reach restricted pages.
frontend/src/components/AdminDashboard.t: A comprehensive admin dashboard component with tabbed views for managing doctors and emergency cases, including stat cards, status/severity color helpers, and actions like toggling availability, updating case status, and assigning doctors.
frontend/src/components/AdminPanel.tsx: Empty file with no content or exports.
frontend/src/components/AdminPortal.tsx: A passcode-protected admin portal that gates access to the AdminDashboard component, using sessionStorage to persist authentication state with a hardcoded passcode.
frontend/src/components/AIInsights.tsx: React component displaying AI-generated health insight cards with mini bar charts, trend badges, and scores for cardiovascular, respiratory, blood pressure, and overall wellness metrics.
frontend/src/components/CaseManagement.t: Displays a searchable, filterable list of emergency cases fetched from the backend, separating them into emergency (critical/high) and regular categories with color-coded severity and status badges.
frontend/src/components/DeploymentManage: Empty file with no content or exports.
frontend/src/components/DoctorManagement: Provides a form to register new doctors with a registration code and lists existing doctors with the ability to toggle their availability, supporting an optional read-only mode.
frontend/src/components/DoctorPortal.tsx: A doctor-facing portal with login/registration flows and a dashboard showing department-specific cases, availability toggle, and emergency case highlights for the logged-in doctor.
frontend/src/components/EmergencySOS.tsx: Empty file with no content or exports.
Empty file with no content or exports.
frontend/src/components/FaucetManagement: Empty file with no content or exports.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Renders the site footer with a vibrant CTA banner encouraging early adoption, brand info, department links, and contact details. Includes animated decorative elements and navigation via TanStack Router.
frontend/src/components/Header.tsx: Renders a fixed site header with a top info bar, scrollable navigation links, logo, and mobile menu. Handles smooth scrolling to page sections and navigation using TanStack Router.
frontend/src/components/HomePage.tsx: Composes the main public-facing home page with a hero section, services, stats, doctors listing, and contact sections. Fetches public doctor data and displays aspirational platform messaging.
frontend/src/components/LandingPage.tsx: A simpler alternative landing page highlighting key features (security, AI, multi-role), onboarding steps, and CTAs to get started or explore the platform.
frontend/src/components/MedicalReportAna: Empty file with no content or exports.
frontend/src/components/PatientPortal.ts: Provides a patient portal with a case registration form and a symptom checker tab, allowing patients to submit medical cases with department and severity selection.
frontend/src/components/ProfileSetupModa: Empty file with no content or exports.
Empty file with no content or exports.
frontend/src/components/RoleSelector.tsx: Renders a role selection landing page with three portal cards (Patient, Doctor, Admin), each with features, styling, and navigation to their respective routes.
frontend/src/components/SmartAlerts.tsx: Displays a filterable list of patient health alerts (critical, warning, normal) with demo data, severity-based styling, and time-ago timestamps.
frontend/src/components/SupportButton.ts: A fixed floating button that toggles a popover with a support email link, closing when clicking outside.
frontend/src/components/SymptomChecker.t: A keyword-based symptom checker that matches user-entered symptoms against predefined rules and displays condition, medication, dosage, and notes suggestions.
Displays a real-time patient vitals dashboard with simulated heart rate, blood pressure, SpO2, and temperature readings, including sparkline charts and status indicators.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: A React Query hook that creates and caches an authenticated or anonymous ICP backend actor, invalidating dependent queries when the identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides a React context and hook for Internet Identity authentication on the ICP platform, managing login/logout state, identity persistence, and AuthClient creation with configurable options.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines React Query hooks for fetching and mutating backend data (user profiles, doctors, emergency cases) with error handling helpers and auto-refresh intervals.
frontend/src/index.css: Global stylesheet that imports fonts, configures Tailwind CSS layers, defines CSS custom properties for light/dark themes, and declares animation keyframes and utility classes.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point that mounts the React app with QueryClientProvider and InternetIdentityProvider wrapping the root App component.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility functions for reading, storing, and clearing URL parameters from both query strings and hash-based routes, with sessionStorage persistence support.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration extending the default theme with custom font families, a full brand color palette (teal, cyan, coral, rose, violet), and CSS variable-based semantic color tokens.
project_state.json: Project state manifest describing the Vitals AI healthcare app's current features, known issues, and pending feature requests focused on rebuilding a working admin portal with auto-refreshing stats.
